intro: Feliciotis cryptantha, commonly known as the cryptantha hibiscus, is a flowering plant native to tropical and subtropical regions. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its showy, trumpet-shaped flowers that range in color from white to deep pink. Its leaves are typically ovate and have a smooth texture. Feliciotis cryptantha thrives in well-drained soil and requires ample sunlight to flourish.
